casebody.data:
No. 11-334. Adventure Outdoors, Inc., et al., Petitioners v. Michael Bloomberg, Mayor of the City of New York, et al. 565 U.S. 1060, 132 S. Ct. 763,

181 L. Ed. 2d 485,

2011 U.S. LEXIS 8530. November 28, 2011.

Petition for writ of certiorari to the Court of Appeals of Georgia denied.

Same case below, 307 Ga. App. 356, 705 S.E.2d 241.
